boostDialog.text: Support {name} and stand out more in chat!

claimClanDialog.title: Claim clan
claimClanDialog.text1: Add this code to your clan description in the game to verify your ownership
clanGraphs.empty: Clan graphs coming soon. We need to collect more than 1 week of data
clanNotVerifiedDialog.title: Whoops...
clanNotVerifiedDialog.text1: It seems we couldn’t verify your clan ownership.
clanNotVerifiedDialog.text2: Make sure you’ve added the claim code to your clan description and that you’ve not made any typos.
clanNotVerifiedDialog.text3: Still having trouble? Send us an email (contact@clay.io)
conversation.followMessage: Follow {name} to post to this group
conversationImageView.title: Image
deckList.noDecksMine: Select a popular deck to add it, or create a new deck
donateDialog.title: Donate
donateDialog.text1: Show your support for {name}. All proceeds go to {name}. Non-refundable
donateDialog.text2: As a bonus, you can personalize your appearance in {name}’s chat group, and you may receive a special shoutout in their next video!
events.noEvents: There are currently no public events scheduled. Check back soon!
forumSignature.label: Signature URL
getAppDialog.text: Take your stats on the go with the Starfire app for Android and iOS!
groupInfo.title: About
idNotFoundDialog.title: Whoops...
idNotFoundDialog.text1: It seems we couldn’t find that player tag.
idNotFoundDialog.text2: Make sure you’re inputting the correct tag, and that you’ve not made any typos.
idNotFoundDialog.text3: Still having trouble? Send us an email (contact@clay.io)
idNotFoundDialog.findTag: How do I find my tag?
inputError.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
inputError.emailExists: An account with that email already exists
installOverlay.title: Add Starfire to homescreen
installOverlay.instructions: Select 'Add to homescreen' to pin the Starfi.re web app
join.title: Get started!
joinGroupDialog.text: Ask your clan leader for the group password to join
newThread.link: Link your Clash Royale profile to continue
nps.appStore1: We'd love it if you could rate Starfire in the app store :)
nps.appStore2: Having more ratings helps us a lot!
nps.description: Loving the app? Have a suggestion? Your feedback helps shape Starfire.
nps.num1to10: Must be a number between 0 and 10
nps.title: Thoughts?
offlineOverlay.text: Looks like you're offline. Reconnect to the internet to resume
playersFollowing.emptyDiv1: Keep track of your friends or favorite players!
playersFollowing.emptyDiv2: Find players to follow through chat or the players list
playersSearch.playerTagError: Hmm, we can't find that tag
playersSearch.description: Find any player's stats, then follow them to stay up to date
policies.title: Privacy and content
policies.description: By registering, you agree to Starfire's Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, and Supercell's Fan Content Policy
profileInfo.splitsInfoCardText: Note: the stats below will only account for your previous 25 games initially. All future stats will be tracked
profileInfo.waitDescription: You can refresh once every {number} minutes
profileLanding.title: Clash Royale stats
profileLanding.description: Automatically track your wins, losses, donations and more with your player tag
profileLanding.terms: You can find your player tag by tapping on your username in Clash Royale to open your profile. It's located right below your username
profileLanding.terms2: This content is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by Supercell and Supercell is not responsible for it. Must be 13 or older.
pushNotificationsSheet.message: Turn on notifications so you don't miss any events or messages
requestNotificationsCard.request: Would you like to turn on notifications? You'll receive a daily recap of your progress
requestNotificationsCard.turnedOn: Notifications have been eneabled! You can always adjust them from the settings
requestNotificationsCard.noThanks: If you change your mind, notifications can be toggled on from the settings
signIn.title: Welcome back!
social.title: Social
stripeDialog.title: Payment
translateCard.request2: If you want Starfire translated into {language} we would love your help
userOfWeek.title: Chance at a $25 Visa Gift Card
userOfWeek.text1: Every week we will randomly pick one person who has contributed quality content to the community to get a $25 Visa Gift Card.
userOfWeek.text2: Throughout the week we'll be watching the forum for quality posts - whether they be helpful or entertaining, and adding the creator to the drawing. Then each Monday we'll randomly pick one person who will get the gift card.
